example.code: PS C:\> Request-IAMServiceLastAccessedDetail -Arn arn:aws:iam::123456789012:user/TestUser Output: f0b7a819-eab0-929b-dc26-ca598911cb9f PS C:\> Get-IAMServiceLastAccessedDetail -JobId f0b7a819-eab0-929b-dc26-ca598911cb9f
example.description: This example provides details of the service last accessed by the IAM entity(user, group, role or policy) associated in Request call.
